headlines.headline: Why Stephen A. doubts Spurs can win a championship this season
headlines.description: Stephen A. Smith believes the Spurs will win a championship eventually, but explains why they could run into trouble come playoff time this season.

headlines.headline: Spurs humble Pistons with 114-103 victory in potential NBA Finals preview
headlines.description: — Victor Wembanyama had 21 points, 17 rebounds and six blocks, Devin Vassell scored 28 and the San Antonio Spurs beat the Detroit Pistons...

headlines.headline: What's next for 10 lottery-bound teams ahead of the NBA draft?
headlines.description: NBA insiders break down the biggest questions for 10 lottery-bound teams after the trade deadline and ahead of the draft.

headlines.headline: Smith scores 31 points and Thompson adds 20 as Rockets beat the Jazz 125-105
headlines.description: — Jabari Smith Jr. had 31 points and nine rebounds and Amen Thompson scored 20 points as the Houston Rockets beat the Utah Jazz 125-105 on Monday night.

headlines.headline: 2026 NFL offseason: News from coaches, GMs at combine
headlines.description: Here are the latest updates from coaches and general managers speaking at the 2026 NFL combine.

headlines.headline: Falcons GM informed QB Cousins he'll be released on March 11
headlines.description: New Falcons GM Ian Cunningham has informed QB Kirk Cousins that the team will release him on March 11, the first day of the league year, Cunningham said Tuesday on 92.9 The Game.

headlines.headline: Could we see Kirk Cousins return to the Vikings?
headlines.description: The "Get Up" crew wonders whether Kirk Cousins could return to the Minnesota Vikings next season.

headlines.headline: Lions return to international play with 2026 game in Germany
headlines.description: For the first time since 2015, the Lions will play an international game, this time in Munich, Germany, with their opponent and date to be named later.

headlines.headline: Mel Kiper Jr. makes case for Steelers drafting Ty Simpson
headlines.description: Mel Kiper Jr. joins "Get Up" and breaks down why Ty Simpson would be a good option for the Steelers in the 2026 NFL draft.

headlines.headline: Foxworth: A.J. Brown 'probably getting close to the end' with Eagles
headlines.description: Domonique Foxworth and Jason McCourty react to Nick Sirianni's comments Monday about A.J. Brown's future with the Eagles.

headlines.headline: Jack Hughes talks Trump backlash over women's team
headlines.description: The Hughes brothers addressed the controversy over President Trump's comment about the women's hockey team.

headlines.headline: Who has won a Stanley Cup, Olympic gold in the same year?
headlines.description: Winning Olympic gold and the Stanley Cup in one year remains one of hockey's rarest feats. Check out who has achieved the honor now.

headlines.headline: Post-Olympics NHL Bubble Watch: Every team's playoff chances
headlines.description: With the medals awarded, the sprint is on to the end of the regular season.
